# Inline message (plain text)

:::message alert
hello
:::

# Inline message (link)

:::message alert
[link](https://example.com)
:::

# Inline message (complex)

:::message alert
## heading
before.[link](https://example.com).after
:::

# Paragraph message (plain text)

:::message alert

hello

:::

# Paragraph message (cpmplex)

:::message alert

[link](https://example.com)

:::
